entry.string: The XML-RPC validator API is a XML-RPC API used to validate a XML-RPC installation on conformance to the specification. It implements the necessary methods on the server so test clients can validate whether the server conforms to the specification.
entry.translation: Zee XML-RPC feleedetur EPI is a XML-RPC EPI used tu feleedete-a a XML-RPC instelleshun oon cunffurmunce-a tu zee speceefficeshun. It implements zee necessery methuds oon zee serfer su test cleeents cun feleedete-a vhezeer zee serfer cunffurms tu zee speceefficeshun.

entry.string: In Xaraya the webservices module is responsible for providing the xmlrpc transport needed for this API functionality. This module will not function without the webservices module activated.
entry.translation: In Xereya zee vebserfeeces mudoole-a is respunseeble-a fur prufeeding zee xmlrpc trunspurt needed fur thees EPI fooncshuneleety. Bork bork bork! Thees mudoole-a veell nut fooncshun veethuoot zee vebserfeeces mudoole-a ecteefeted.

entry.string: You can use this to validate whether the Xaraya XML-RPC server conforms to the standard.
entry.translation: Yuoo cun use-a thees tu feleedete-a vhezeer zee Xereya XML-RPC serfer cunffurms tu zee stunderd.
Zeere-a ere-a nu inclooded huuks. Um gesh dee bork, bork!
